entry.title: Ukraine's Tiny Snake Island Plays an Outsize Role in the War
entry.content: The rocky Black Sea outcrop has been fiercely contested territory since Russia conquered it in February. But for Moscow, it is as much a liability as an asset.

entry.title: Outgunned Ukrainian Forces Work to Avoid Becoming Surrounded in Donbas
entry.content: Ukrainian troops have sought to occupy higher ground in the town of Lysychansk after losing nearby Severodonetsk as Russia targeted military facilities across western and northern Ukraine.

entry.title: Shanghai's Covid Lockdown Legacy: Confusion, Despair, Departure
entry.content: Diaries of residents who lived through the cityâ€™s long battle against Covid-19 reveal their journey from complacency to shock to a growing sense of disillusionment with the government.
